AddCdnDomain.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdn.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AddCdnDomain
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Origin": {
        "OriginType": "ip",
        "Origins": [
            "1.1.1.1"
        ]
    },
    "ProjectId": "0",
    "Domain": "www.test.com",
    "ServiceType": "web",
    "Area": "mainland"
}
AddCdnDomain.title: 新增加速域名

CreateScdnFailedLogTask.title: 重新创建SCDN事件日志任务

CreateScdnLogTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdn.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateScdnLogTask
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Domain": "test.com",
    "AttackType": "xss",
    "Ip": "10.0.0.1",
    "AttackTypes": [
        "xss"
    ],
    "DefenceMode": "observe",
    "Mode": "waf",
    "StartTime": "2020-09-22 00:00:00",
    "Domains": [
        "test.com"
    ],
    "EndTime": "2020-09-22 00:00:00",
    "Conditions": [
        {
            "Operator": "include",
            "Value": "10.0.0.1",
            "Key": "ip"
        }
    ]
}
CreateScdnLogTask.title: 创建scdn日志事件任务

}
